quote: Problem is that the acting head of the FBI & the person in charge of the Hillary investigation, Andrew McCabe, got $700,000 from H for wife!
quotePlain: Problem is that the acting head of the FBI & the person in charge of the Hillary investigation, Andrew McCabe, got $700,000 from H for wife!
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: A Virginia state candidate married to an FBI official did get donations from a longtime Clinton supporter, McAuliffe, who was also the Democratic governor of Virginia. But the tweet ignores at the spouse played no role in fundraising for his wife’s campaign, and it ignores that that McAuliffe made the donations on his own, for state-level political goals -- not to influence an investigation that Andrew McCabe wasn’t even involved in yet.
checks.short: This tweet distorts key elements of the story, severely undercutting its accuracy.
checks.quotePlain: A Virginia state candidate married to an FBI official did get donations from a longtime Clinton supporter, McAuliffe, who was also the Democratic governor of Virginia. But the tweet ignores at the spouse played no role in fundraising for his wife’s campaign, and it ignores that that McAuliffe made the donations on his own, for state-level political goals – not to influence an investigation that Andrew McCabe wasn’t even involved in yet.
checks.shortPlain: This tweet distorts key elements of the story, severely undercutting its accuracy.

checks.quote: But the contributions didn’t come from Clinton or her campaign, and Andrew McCabe wasn’t “in charge” of the FBI’s investigation of Clinton’s emails at the time of the donations, either.
checks.quotePlain: But the contributions didn’t come from Clinton or her campaign, and Andrew McCabe wasn’t “in charge” of the FBI’s investigation of Clinton’s emails at the time of the donations, either.

claims.title: Hillary Clinton gave almost $700,000 to wife of FBI agent investigating her
claims.negative: Hillary Clinton didn't give almost $700,000 to wife of FBI agent investigating her
claims.negativePlain: Hillary Clinton didn’t give almost $700,000 to wife of FBI agent investigating her
claims.truth: The timeline is wrong and the connections are exaggerated
claims.truthPlain: The timeline is wrong and the connections are exaggerated
